name: AR Indonesia's Museum (Android Platform)
description:
Hello there, 
This is my Augmented reality software that will show you all kind of thing about Indonesia's culture and the history of Indonesia.
(this project has been made in 2020)

Feature :
- WW2 weaponry and tools

Pending Feature :

- Quiz and other Feature 

Thanks, and See you next time
